element.name: alsamidisrc
element.description: Push ALSA MIDI sequencer events around
element.author: Antonio Ospite <ao2@ao2.it>

element.name: alsasink
element.description: Output to a sound card via ALSA
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim@fluendo.com>

caps.name: sink
caps.details: audio/x-raw, format=(string){ S8, U8, S16LE, S16BE, U16LE, U16BE, S24_32LE, S24_32BE, U24_32LE, U24_32BE, S32LE, S32BE, U32LE, U32BE, S24LE, S24BE, U24LE, U24BE, S20LE, S20BE, U20LE, U20BE, S18LE, S18BE, U18LE, U18BE, F32LE, F32BE, F64LE, F64BE }, layout=(string)interleaved, rate=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ]; audio/x-ac3, framed=(boolean)true; audio/x-eac3, framed=(boolean)true; audio/x-dts, framed=(boolean)true, block-size=(int){ 512, 1024, 2048 }; audio/mpeg, mpegversion=(int)1, mpegaudioversion=(int)[ 1, 2 ], parsed=(boolean)true

element.name: alsasrc
element.description: Read from a sound card via ALSA
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim@fluendo.com>

caps.name: src
caps.details: audio/x-raw, format=(string){ S8, U8, S16LE, S16BE, U16LE, U16BE, S24_32LE, S24_32BE, U24_32LE, U24_32BE, S32LE, S32BE, U32LE, U32BE, S24LE, S24BE, U24LE, U24BE, S20LE, S20BE, U20LE, U20BE, S18LE, S18BE, U18LE, U18BE, F32LE, F32BE, F64LE, F64BE }, layout=(string)interleaved, rate=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ]
